original_title: 「おっぱいだけなら触ってもいいよ」厳しすぎる部活の優しすぎる女子マネージャー。初心者が運動部の部活に入ったはいいけどついていけず、部活にいかなくなって早数日。なんと心配した心優しいお世話好きなマネージャーが部活を抜け出しボクを引き止めに自宅にやってきた。
overview: When a beginner joined the club activities of the athletic club but was too strict to keep up with the club activities, a worried gentle manager came to his house. But I didn't want him to care, so I said, "If you let me touch your boobs, I'll go to club activities." Then, the manager who is too kind acknowledges that "if only boobs"! I was surprised, but when I was excited by the chance that suddenly came around and attacked me as well as rubbing it, the excited manager went to the god development seeking continuation!
title: 'You Can Touch My Tits, But That's All' The Female Manager Of My Team Is Really Nice But Very Strict In My Innocence, I Joined The Team, But I Had A Hard Time Keeping Up
